'''''Tolkien Criticism: An Annotated Checklist''''' is a descriptive bibliography of books and articles by and about [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], compiled by [[Richard C. West]]. 

The book includes some quotes from hard-to-find writings by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]: (1) Entry A24 on page 5 quotes from the Preface published in ''[[The Ancrene Riwle]]''; (2) Entry B109 on page 34 reprints the brief extract from [[Letter to Richard Lupoff|a letter to Richard Lupoff]] first printed in ''[[Edgar Rice Burroughs: Master of Adventure]]''. 

A revised edition of the work was published in 1981 (177 pages, ISBN 978-0873382564).

==Contents (1st Ed.)==

*Foreword
*List of Abbreviations
*Section A: Tolkien's Writings
*Section B: Critical Works on Tolkien
*Section C: Book Reviews
*Section D: Index of Titles
